Song.title: Our God Is Present
Song.copyright: Josh White Â© Spinning Audio Vortex, Inc. (Admin. by Capitol CMG Publishing), Touch The Sun Publishing (Admin. by Capitol CMG Publishing)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: All those who[C] seek the throne o[Am]f grace Find that[F] throne in every[C] place If we[C] live a life of[Am] prayer Our God is[F] present every[C]wher[G]e.
Verse 2: In ou[C]r sickness or our[Am] health In our[F] want or in our[C] wealth If we[C] look to God in[Am] prayer Our God is[F] present every[C]wher[G]e.
Chorus: Our God is[F] present, Our God is[C] present [Em] Our God is[F] present every[C]where.[G]
Opt. Inter: [| C | Am | F | C G |]
Verse 3: When our[C] earthly comforts[Am] fail When the [F] pain of life pre[C]vails Now is the[C] time for earnest[Am] prayer Our God is[F] present every[C]wher[G]e.
Verse 4: Then, my[C] soul, in every[Am] strait To thy [F]Father come and[C] wait He will[C] answer every[Am] prayer Our God is[F] present every[C]wher[G]e.
Ending: [| C | C C Am Em | C | C C Am Em | C |]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 all those who seek the throne of grace find that throne in every place if we live a life of prayer our god is present everywhere verse 2 in our sickness or our health in our want or in our wealth if we look to god in prayer our god is present everywhere chorus our god is present our god is present our god is present everywhere opt inter verse 3 when our earthly comforts fail when the pain of life prevails now is the time for earnest prayer our god is present everywhere verse 4 then my soul in every strait to thy father come and wait he will answer every prayer our god is present everywhere ending
